title: Operation of Travel Services Counters at the Arrival Public Concourse (Lobby) at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA), Katunayake
decision_details:
- Airport and Aviation Services (Sri Lanka) (Private) Limited has invited bids for the operation of six (06) Travel Services Counters at the Arrival Public Concourse (Lobby) at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA), Katunayake and 12 bids have been received for that. The proposal made by the Minister of Ports, Shipping and Aviation to grant permission for the following bidders who have responded substantially and submitted highest quotations, to utilize the said premises for a period of 03 years, as recommended by the Technical Evaluation Committee and the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, having evaluated the said bids, was approved by the Cabinet:
